targets.query: SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT (last("Power DC1") + last("Power DC2")) FROM "modbus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval*4) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Current battery charge-discharge power")  FROM "modbus" WHERE "Current battery charge-discharge power" > 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

SELECT moving_average(mean("Actual battery charge -minus or discharge -plus current"),40) * moving_average(mean("Battery voltage"),40) * (-1)  FROM "modbus" WHERE $timeFilter AND "Actual battery charge -minus or discharge -plus current" <0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

params: Current battery charge -minus or discharge -plus current

targets.query: SELECT moving_average(mean("Actual battery charge -minus or discharge -plus current"),40) * moving_average(mean("Battery voltage"),40) *(-1)  FROM "modbus" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

params: Actual battery charge -minus or discharge -plus current

targets.query: SELECT mean("Home own consumption from grid") FROM "modbus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("Total active power (powermeter)") * -1 / ((24 * 60 * 60) / count("Total active power (powermeter)")) / 24 FROM "modbus" WHERE ("Total active power (powermeter)" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT sum("Total active power (powermeter)") * -1 / ((24 * 60 * 60) / count("Total active power (powermeter)")) / 24 FROM "modbus" WHERE ("Total active power (powermeter)" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT sum("Total active power (powermeter)") / ((24 * 60 * 60) / count("Total active power (powermeter)")) / 24 / 7 / -1000 * $kWEuroEinspeisung FROM "modbus" WHERE ("Total active power (powermeter)" < 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1w) tz('Europe/Berlin')

SELECT sum("Total active power (powermeter)") / ((24 * 60 * 60) / count("Total active power (powermeter)")) / 24 / 7 / -1000 * $kWEuroBezug FROM "modbus" WHERE ("Total active power (powermeter)" > 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1w) tz('Europe/Berlin')
